Andreas, it looks like your update didn't complete properly.  Could you re-update via Help > Software Updates > Find and Install > "Search for new features to install".

For more details see: http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_FAQ#Download_Mylar

Reinstalled, working- sorry for the confusion, didn't see that happening before. For some very weird reason my Mylar update site had gone as well so it couldn't pick up the failed/ missing update itself.
Yes, there were some mirror problems at eclipse.org I believe. Glad to hear you're up and running!
